revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Token | name = You've destroyed the Converter | class = QuestItem25 | game = Strife | convid = 336 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:QuestItem|QuestItem]]→QuestItem25
''Quest Flag 25 - Destroyed the [[Classes:Zombie|Acolyte]] converter in the factory. One of two flags checked to determine what "good" ending the player will receive. See also [[Classes:QuestItem27|Flag 27]]. Doing this also gives the player a Stamina Upgrade and an Accuracy Upgrade.'' ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR QuestItem25 : {{Class|QuestItem}} {}
